授業目的:
Course Goals
• To equip students with English speaking and listening skills
• To provide students with guidance and practice in basic conversation
• To develop students’ academic listening, speaking and presentation skills
• To help students improve their English comprehensibility through pronunciation practice
• To improve TOEIC scores
到達目標:
Fall Semester Skills to be Achieved
1. Advanced Group Discussion Skills
a. Articulation of a complete idea
b. Negotiation skills, suggesting ideas, giving reasons
c. Agreeing and disagreeing
d. Applying useful phrases for negotiation
e. Introduce politeness strategies
f. How to debate, giving your opinion
2. Advanced Presentation/Speaking Skills
a. Presenting without reading
b. Organizing presentations
c. Delivery, body language, fluency, and intonation for presentation
3. TOEIC Listening
a. Development of listening and note-taking skills
b. Improve TOEIC listening skills
授業方法:
1. English is used in class.
2. Preparation before the class is essential.
3. Occasional workshops are conducted

If online learning is scheduled, the course format will be changed. Please follow your teacher’s instruction.
